data.name: RPG Maker VX Ace - Sci-Fi Music Pack
data.detailed_description:
Blast off to adventure with these 25 BGM tracks! Explore lost worlds, battle cybernetic foes, or delve into the heart of the machine with this futuristic music pack.

Tune your sensors to receive this transmission of 25 BGM tracks that will carry you into the far flung future! Set the mood in dystopian city-worlds, desolate alien landscapes, and the home planet of your robot overlords. Boldly battle cyborgs, navigate modern menus, and chart a path through techno dungeons with this mighty music pack.

Music preview on Soundcloud


This pack contains:
  • 25 BGM tracks suitable for battle, dungeons, field, menus, and towns!
  • .wav, .ogg, and .mp3 formats included.
  • Royalty free music to use in your commercial and non-commercial RPG/IG Maker projects.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS:Microsoft® Windows® XP / Vista / 7 (32-bit/64-bit)
  • Processor:Intel® Pentium® 4 2.0 GHz equivalent or faster processor
  • Memory:512 MB RAM
  • Graphics:1024 x 768 pixels or higher desktop resolution
  • Hard Drive:400 MB HD space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Processor:Intel® Pentium® 4 2.0 GHz equivalent or faster processor
  • Memory:512 MB RAM
